Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class TestScannersFromClientSide2

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestScannersFromClientSide2
public class TestScannersFromClientSide2 extends Object
Testcase for newly added feature in HBASE-17143, such as startRow and stopRow inclusive/exclusive, limit for rows, etc.
